00254       * Prefix added to input file names.
00255       *
00256       * If this is a file path, with a trailing directory separator,
00257       * all input files will be sought in this directory.
00258       */
00259       std::string    inputPrefix_;

00262       * Prefix added to output file names.
00263       *

00266       */
